thoughts.text: We should now execute the test file to make sure the code works as expected.
thoughts.reasoning: Executing the test file will help us ensure that the code works as expected and that any future changes to the code do not introduce new bugs or issues. If the tests fail, we can identify the issue and fix it before it becomes a bigger problem.
thoughts.plan:
- Execute the test file
- Make sure the tests pass
- If the tests fail, identify the issue and fix it
thoughts.criticism: I need to make sure that I am not ignoring any failing tests. If a test fails, I need to identify the issue and fix it before moving on.
thoughts.speak: We should now execute the test file to make sure the code works as expected. This will help us ensure that the code works as expected and that any future changes to the code do not introduce new bugs or issues.
